item.title: Houdini - VEX
item.description: General Partition points Here is a vex version of a techique I saw John Kunz use in Vops. Note that the points comming in on the second input will be the “cluster centers”. Theese points can be generated anyway you want, for instance by the scatter node or by fusing “the original points” and with the snap distance control how many centers you want.
